{"step_by_step_thinking": "A material that speeds up a chemical reaction without chemically becoming involved is called a catalyst. A solvent is a substance that dissolves another substance to form a solution. A base is a substance that accepts protons or donates electron pairs. Thermoplastic is a type of polymer that becomes soft and moldable when heated and solidifies upon cooling. Therefore, the correct answer is C. A catalyst.", "answer_choice": "C"}
